verses.verse: <S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H2896>good;<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
<S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
<S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
To Him who <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6381>wonders,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
To Him who <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> with <S%H8394>skill,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
To Him who <S%H7554>spread<s%> out the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
To Him who <S%H6213>made<s%> [the] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H216>lights,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is everlasting: <S%H5769><s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
The <S%H3394>moon<s%> and <S%H3556>stars<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
To Him who <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> in their first-born, For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
And <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out from their <S%H8432>midst,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
With a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
To Him who <S%H1504>divided<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H1506>asunder,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
And made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it, For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
But He <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H2428>army<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
To Him who <S%H1980>led<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
To Him who <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
And <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is everlasting: <S%H5769><s%>
<S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
And <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
And <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> as a <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
Even a <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> His <S%H5650>servant,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
<S%H7945>Who<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> us in our <S%H8216>low<s%> <S%H8216>estate,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>
And has <S%H6561>rescued<s%> us from our <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%>
Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
<S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
